title: How the fuck do I play Ascension without people being absolutely toxic?
body: Ever goddamn game, there's always people complaining about the team who don't have enough points and keep calling everyone useless when they die. Holy fuck this gamemode sucks because it just induces more toxicity, I've played the older Ascension mode and why is it really bad now?

replies.body: You press the mute button and never look back....

you uninstall and stop playing this toxic aids of a game!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

That doesn't work. I speak from experience.

Plenty of experience...

Hey X88*******,

The problem is, if I use Unblock Player, they will then become "Unblocked" and should I come across them again in the future, I will be exposed to their detrimental comments, again!

I have, probably, over 1000 in my block list. That is 1000+ arseholes I want nothing to do with and, ... everytime I go to block someone or find someone I wish to 'unblock' because sometimes they will reform (not often enough tho) I have to see disgusting names like "JewBBQ" - which just happens to top the list. C'mon, any reasonable person should not be subject to this... or should they?

well imo ascension is basically normals but with more people not knowing what the hell is going on.  It can be toxic at times but amazing at other times. I've had some real rotters in normals and sometimes in the rotating gamemode too but overall it's still fun. I find ranked is overall the least toxic environment despite what people say but that's just me and maybe being midsilver (though I'm definitely bronze level) just has the most chill and friendly players.
